songs.title: War
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The government lied
The media lied
Your mama lied
Your grade school lied
Fuckin' liars (ha)
Fuckin' liars (ha)
Fuckin' liars (ha)
Fuckin' liars

[Verse 2]
The agenda lied
Conservatives lied
The liberals lied
Nobody real tried
Fuckin' liars (ha)
Fuckin' liars (ha)
Fuckin' liars (ha)
Fuckin' liars

[Pre-Chorus]
So keep on pushing your position
And make 'em swallow up your vision
Another organized religion
Dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
So take your capitalist interest
And make America your bitches
Another body on the hitlist
Dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down

[Chorus]
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down like
1, 2, 3, 4, everybody go to war
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down like
1, 2, 3, 4, everybody go to war

[Verse 3]
The videos lied
The radio lied
The empire falls
The innocent fry
The jail cells overflow, make a profit off of hope
Everybody here belongs but nobody here is home

[Pre-Chorus]
So keep on pushing your position
And make 'em swallow up your vision
Another organized religion
Dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
So take your capitalist interest
And make America your bitches
Another body on the hitlist
Dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down

[Chorus]
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down like
1, 2, 3, 4, everybody go to war
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down like
1, 2, 3, 4, everybody go to war

[Bridge]
We are a country built on greed
History books nobody should read
Land of the fake where the richest are free
Do as they say and they'll let you breathe
(Unh, unh, unh, unh, unh, unh, ahhh)

[Pre-Chorus]
So keep on pushing your position
And make 'em swallow up your vision
Another organized religion
Dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
So take your capitalist interest
And make America your bitches
Another body on the hitlist
Dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down

[Chorus]
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down like
1, 2, 3, 4, everybody go to war
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
(They all fall down)
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down
(They all fall down)
Go, dumb de dumb dumb they all fall down like
(They all fall down)
1, 2, 3, 4, everybody go to war

[Outro]
Ha, whoah
Ha, ha, ha, ha
Like 1, 2, 3, 4, everybody go to war
Ha, ha, ha, oh
Ha, ha, ha, RIOT!
